General.Description: The first currency was designed for Global Dental Industry, Dentacoin (DCN) which is effective for anyone who concerns about their dental health. Dentacoin is the best choice not only pay for dental treatment but also to improve dental care by setting up blockchain-based tools worldwidely.
General.Features: The first outstanding attribute that visitors come to DCN is the blockchain-based trusted review platform that supports the customers to share the experiences to others. Moroever, the amount of Dentacoins produced is so huge, it is over 8 trillion now. Finally, DCN provide a model enable to secure lifetime medical record sharing.
General.Technology: Dentacoin is an innovative achievement from Ethereum blockchain which provides solutions for the global dentistry industry. By using a value-based approach, it is easy for them to advance market research in the field of dentistry.
General.Sponsor: The Dentacoin coin is being developed by the Dentacoin Foundation which is one of the members of the IEEE Computational Intelligence society, EADM and Union of Automation and Informatics has more than 27 years experience in financial markets.

ICO.Description: Dentacoin was firsly Tokensale on 01 October 2017.After the ICO, DCN focus on expand the market and target marketing strategies.
